front.title: IEEE Standard for Test Code for Switching and Fault Making Tests for High-Voltage Interrupter Switches, Interrupters or Interrupting Aids Used on or Attached to Switches Rated for Alternating Currents Above 1000 V

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Test code for switching (except capacitive current) and fault making tests for switching devices for alternating current, rated above 1000 V and used indoors, outdoors, or in enclosures is specified in this standard.
